fixes.name: Accounts Above Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Rewrote the Tableau IF to a DAX IF and replaced the parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As]). All column references were converted to the 'accounts+'[ColumnName] format. The expression returns the AccountID when CurrentBalance is greater than or equal to the selected Balance Threshold, otherwise BLANK().
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
